name: particle-strip
author: DonGar, Adafruit, Technobly
description:
Control several RGB LED Strip types (Digital RGB, NeoPixel, DotStart).

An identical interface for all hardware types, and able to drive multiple
different types of strands at once.

Includes Pattern library to easily perform several standard patterns, report
the current pattern as an event, and update patterns as a Cloud function calls.

Please send bug reports (especially for new hardware) to dgarrett@acm.org.
